RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 1 350 Y Dirt CR: 73. Allowance Purse 9500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF 3 RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PAINTED RARE lugged out, held on. GREY BISCUIT late surge, missed. HIGH SIX JESS ducked in, game third. J BEST PRINCESS chased leaders. NO TORIOUS no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Painted Rare
ENTRY.COMMENT: lugged out, held on

ENTRY.NAME: High Six Jess
ENTRY.COMMENT: ducked in, game third

ENTRY.NAME: J Best Princess
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leaders

ENTRY.NAME: Grey Biscuit
ENTRY.COMMENT: late surge, missed

ENTRY.NAME: No Torious
ENTRY.COMMENT: no impact

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 63. Maiden Special Weight Purse 10700. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAKARA went to the front to set all the pace, held off all challengers and won going away late. MOBILEAGILEHOSTILE tracked the leaders on the backstretch then moved up from three wide on the turn, was asked at the quarter pole and took aim at the leader in early stretch but couldn't catch the leader but was a clear second. SPARKLE IN THE SKY was rushed up to press the pace from the two path to the three furlong marker and faded. ITHOUGHTIKNEW was off the pace for a quarter then retreated while racing wide through the turn. KINSLEYS SWEET PEA saved ground throughout to no avail.

ENTRY.NAME: Kinsleys Sweet Pea
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, no avail

ENTRY.NAME: Sparkle in the Sky
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up, pressed pace, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Makara
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, going away late

ENTRY.NAME: Mobileagilehostile
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, 3wturn, couldn't catch, clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Ithoughtiknew
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 1/4, retreated, wide thru turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 3 5F Dirt CR: 44. Maiden Special Weight Purse 9700. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ACES OVER DEUCES was roused to a clear lead to set all the pace and just out lasted the late closing rival. MAYA D saved ground to mid turn then angled out to three wide and found another gear and rallied to gain on the leader late but was not enough. I'M GONE was hustled along to be forwardly placed off the leader on the inside through the turn but had no late kick. FLY FREE was off the pace through the turn but lacked a late response. KARMA DE VILLE was off a step slow then moved up from three wide to the turn and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: I'm Gone
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, forwardly placed, no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Maya D
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, 3wturn, rallied, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: Aces Over Deuces
ENTRY.COMMENT: roused to lead, set pace, just lasted

ENTRY.NAME: Fly Free
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: Karma de Ville
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, moved up 3w, stopped

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 4 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 5000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES IN 2022-2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $2,500. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $3,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AUNT IRENE sprinted to a clear lead, drew away on the turn then drifted out in the stretch but kept on to prove best. LADY PHYLLIS was hustled along to be off the pace but was no match for the winner. MY MEADOW chased the leaders from the inside while racing evenly. FLAN hopped leaving the gate, was pinched back and steadied slightly, rushed up going three wide through the turn and tired. ATHENIAN PRINCESS remained back.

ENTRY.NAME: My Meadow
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leaders, saved ground, evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Aunt Irene
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted to lead, drew off, drifted out stretch, best

ENTRY.NAME: Flan
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, pinched back, steadied, rush up, 3wturn, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Athenian Princess
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Phyllis
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, off pace, no match for winner

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 5 7F Dirt CR: 65. Allowance Purse 14100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF A RACE IN 2023 OR NON WINNERS OF FOUR RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CELEE'S LAST TE went to an unchallenged lead, pulled away on the turn and was kept to task in the stretch. FLO TIME raced in the middle of the pack to the half pole then moved up from three wide through the turn and was clearly second best. SUE ETTAS GHOST raced in the middle of the pack down the backstretch and chased the leaders home. FLIPLIT trailed the field while saving ground and passed tiring rival in late stretch. ROCKIN MARIE broke well and settled off the pace to the top of the stretch and gave way grudgingly.

ENTRY.NAME: Celee's Last Te
ENTRY.COMMENT: unchallenged lead, pulled away, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: Sue Ettas Ghost
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, chased leaders

ENTRY.NAME: Flo Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, moved up 3w, clearly second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Fliplit
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, saved ground, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Rockin Marie
ENTRY.OWNER: Long Vaughn Meyer Curtis and West Jeff
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well, off pace, gave way grudgingly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 6 7F Dirt CR: 76. Allowance Purse 12100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY MAN BIGGIE had no early speed then steadily advanced through the turn and split horses at the eighth pole and drew clear. I'M A COOL CAT raced in the middle of the pack on the backstretch then moved up from three wide on the turn, tipping out to four wide in upper to take a brief lead, fought gamely in the stretch. BIG JACK prompted the pace to the quarter pole and engaged the leader but lacked the late kick and was out finished. GRIFTER raced near the back to the turn then moved up on the turn and flattened out. GO LAKER GO sprinted to the lead to the quarter pole then was collared and gave way. DANCING COSSACK was under wraps to the half pole then was taken back, eased and was distanced.

ENTRY.NAME: Go Laker Go
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprint to lead, collared, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Grifter
ENTRY.OWNER: Rust Terri and Rusty Wire Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, moved up turn, flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Dancing Cossack
ENTRY.COMMENT: under wraps, taken back, eased, distanced

ENTRY.NAME: My Man Biggie
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, steady advance, split horses, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: I'm a Cool Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, 3wturn, 4wupper, brief lead, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Big Jack
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt pace, engaged 1/4p, no late kick

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 7 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 6400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $6,250.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HEAR ME ROAR was off the pace through the turn then drove past the leader in the final sixteenth for the win. RETRO RITA was forwardly placed in the three path through the turn, drifted out in the stretch but proved to be second best. LIL' MISS MISCHIEF sprinted to a clear lead to deep stretch, was collared in the final sixteenth and tired. PRAIRIE FIREBALL had no early speed, made a rail bid through the stretch and proved best of the rest. ABUELA CORI raced in the middle of the pack, was bumped by inside rival entering the stretch but was never a threat. YA THINK raced in the middle of the pack while saving ground, floated out entering the stretch and bumped outside rival but was never a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Ya Think
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, saved ground, floated out, bumped, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Abuela Cori
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, bumped upper, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Lil' Miss Mischief
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear lead, collared, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Hear Me Roar
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, drove past leader, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: Prairie Fireball
ENTRY.COMMENT: no early speed, rail bid stretch, best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Retro Rita
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, drifted out stretch, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 8100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF THREE RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: QUEENS RANSOM tracked the leaders around the turn then made a three wide bid in upper stretch, was gaining in the stretch drive and was just up in the final jump. PRINCESS JAYLEEN shared the command to the turn then fell back on the turn, made a rebid in upper stretch and took the lead at the quarter pole and drew clear but was nailed in the final jump. CAJUN TRINITY shared the command to mid turn then shook loose but was caught at the eighth pole and tired. MANDONA failed to menace. MISS IZZY BEE saved ground but was always back.

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Izzy Bee
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, always back

ENTRY.NAME: Mandona
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Princess Jayleen
ENTRY.COMMENT: shared command, fell back turn, rebid upper, nailed

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Trinity
ENTRY.COMMENT: shared command, shook loose, caught 1/8p, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Queens Ransom
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, 3wupper, stretch gain, just up
